title: [Sweet Oblivion, Parlor]
description: Faded walls of lavender and amethyst silk provide a backdrop of a series of ivory-framed portaits, the pictures dotted inbetween pillars of chipped white marble.  Situated at the center of the room is a circular etched glass case displaying rich furs between the dirty surfaces, while several long pastel candy boxes showcase jewelry on stiff lace doilies.  A large filigree-set mirror sits at an angle along the western wall, the web-like cracks of the panes casting odd distorted images of the room beyond.
